## ZKPPacker.pack() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

creates JSON Web Zeroknowledge token

**Signature:**

```typescript
pack(payload: Uint8Array, params: ZKPPackerParams): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payload | Uint8Array | serialized message |
|  params | [ZKPPackerParams](./polygonid-js-sdk.zkppackerparams.md) | sender id and proving alg are required |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

`Promise<Uint8Array>`
